duties_responsibilities.duty: Learn and execute the foundation of construction processes to ensure success in the field.
Ensure a perfectly executed schedule with dedication and attention to detail.
Oversee daily inspection of houses and ensure completion of tasks, adherence to schedules, and meeting of expectations.
Meet with buyers and share the excitement as they witness the stages of their new home coming together.
Maintain strong relationships with trade partners, inspectors, buyers, and colleagues to facilitate effective communication and optimal outcomes.
Proactively manage and maintain budgets, monitor variances, and resolve potential issues.
Work closely with the product/purchasing manager to ensure accuracy of takeoffs, correct materials, and maintenance of trade relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management or a related field (Master's preferred)
